languages.text: "Если будете на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, есть там район — Теневые кварталы. Теневые — потому что они позади статуи святого нашего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} находятся. Знавал я людей, которые их не "Теневыми" кварталами звали, а кое-каким другим словом, но тоже в честь того, что они позади статуи находятся. Не повторяйте их ошибки! Тех людей епископ Иеронимус сразу нашел и сжег".

traits.locale_text: "Если будете на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}, есть там район — Теневые кварталы. Теневые — потому что они позади статуи святого нашего {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} находятся. Знавал я людей, которые их не "Теневыми" кварталами звали, а кое-каким другим словом, но тоже в честь того, что они позади статуи находятся. Не повторяйте их ошибки! Тех людей епископ Иеронимус сразу нашел и сжег".

languages.text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

traits.locale_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

languages.text: «Si alguna vez va a la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}estación de Paso{/g}, hay un distrito allí, los barrios bajos. Está ubicado detrás de la estatua de nuestro sagrado {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Se de gente que lo llamaba de otra manera por estar detrás de la estatua. ¡Por favor, no caiga en el mismo error! El reverendo Hieronymus no vaciló cuando tuvo que encontrarlos y quemarlos a todos».
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez va a la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}estación de Paso{/g}, hay un distrito allí, los barrios bajos. Está ubicado detrás de la estatua de nuestro sagrado {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}. Se de gente que lo llamaba de otra manera por estar detrás de la estatua. ¡Por favor, no caiga en el mismo error! El reverendo Hieronymus no vaciló cuando tuvo que encontrarlos y quemarlos a todos».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr jemals auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Station Footfall{/g} kommt, dort gibt es einen Distrikt, die Schattenquartiere. Er heißt so, weil er hinter der Statue unseres heiligsten {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} liegt. Ich kannte Leute, die ihn anders genannt haben, ebenfalls weil er hinter der Statue liegt. Wiederholt ihren Fehler nicht, sage ich Euch! Reverend Hieronymus hat keine Zeit vergeudet, sie alle aufzuspüren und zu verbrennen."
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

Wiederholt ihren Fehler nicht, sage ich Euch! Reverend Hieronymus hat keine Zeit vergeudet, sie alle aufzuspüren und zu verbrennen."

languages.text: « Si jamais vous passez par la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}station Castel{/g}, vous y trouverez un coin qu'on appelle le Quartier des Ombres. Il tire son nom de son emplacement, juste derrière la statue de notre saint {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}. J'ai déjà entendu des gens appeler ce quartier autrement, sous prétexte qu'il se trouve justement derrière la statue... Mais n'allez surtout pas commettre cette terrible erreur ! Le révérend Hiéronymus a eu vite fait de les retrouver et de les incinérer. »
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Le révérend Hiéronymus a eu vite fait de les retrouver et de les incinérer. »

languages.text: “等您什么时候来{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港星站{/g}的时候，那边有片叫‘阴影区’的地方。之所以叫阴影区，是因为那边刚好处于我们神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}雕像身后。我有几个熟人，给帝皇那片‘身后地带’起了别的名字……您可千万别像那些人一样蠢！希罗尼穆斯牧师毫不费力地找上了他们，把他们全都烧死了。”
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

traits.locale_text: “等您什么时候来{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港星站{/g}的时候，那边有片叫‘阴影区’的地方。之所以叫阴影区，是因为那边刚好处于我们神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}雕像身后。我有几个熟人，给帝皇那片‘身后地带’起了别的名字……您可千万别像那些人一样蠢！希罗尼穆斯牧师毫不费力地找上了他们，把他们全都烧死了。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}を訪れたことがあるなら、そこにシャドウクォーターという地区があるのは知ってるだろ。最も神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の像の後ろに位置してるから、そう呼ばれているのさ。同じく像の裏側にあるって理由で、その地区を別の名前で呼ぶ奴も何人かいたがね。そいつらの過ちを真似しちゃいけないぜ！ヒエロニムス師は違う名で呼んだ奴らをあっという間に探し出して、焼き払っちまったからな」
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}に行けば、そこには影地区という場所がある。最も神聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の像の後ろにあるから、そう呼ばれているのさ。同じく像の裏側にあるって理由で、その地区を別の名前で呼ぶ奴も何人かいたがね。その間違った呼び方を反復して言っちゃいけないぜ！ヒエロニムス司祭はあっという間に違う名で呼んだ奴らを探し出して、焼き払ってしまったんだ」

「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}を訪れたことがあるなら、そこにシャドウクォーターという地区があるのは知ってるだろ。最も神聖な{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}の像の後ろに位置してるから、そう呼ばれているのさ。同じく像の裏側にあるって理由で、その地区を別の名前で呼ぶ奴も何人かいたがね。そいつらの過ちを真似しちゃいけないぜ！ヒエロニムス師は違う名で呼んだ奴らをあっという間に探し出して、焼き払っちまったからな」

languages.text: "Ola ki yolunuz {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman İstasyonu'na{/g} düşerse orada Gölge Mahalli diye bir semt var. Pek kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'umuzun{/g} heykelinin arkasında kaldığı için öyle diyorlar. Heykelin arkasında olduğu için oraya başka bir isim veren insanlar da tanıdım gerçi. Aman diyeyim onların hatalarını tekrarlamayın! Muhterem Hieronymus'un alayını bulup yakması hiç de uzun sürmedi."
languages.original_text: "If you're ever on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g}, there's this district there, the Shadow Quarters. It's called that because it's located behind the statue of our holiest {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}. I've known folks who called it something else, also on account of it being behind the statue. Don't repeat their mistakes, I tell you! Reverend Hieronymus wasted no time finding and burning them all."

traits.locale_text: "Ola ki yolunuz {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman İstasyonu{/g}'na düşerse orada Gölge Mahali diye bir semt var. Pek kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'umuzun heykelinin arkasında kaldığı için öyle diyorlar. Heykelin arkasında olduğu için oraya başka bir isim veren insanlar da tanıdım gerçi. Aman diyeyim onların hatalarını tekrarlamayın! Muhterem Hieronymus'un alayını bulup yakması hiç de uzun sürmedi."
